identity.name: E1_B2B_SaaS
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with AI fluidity
Content is King: Data must be legible and actionable
Negative Space: Use generous padding to prevent dashboard clutter
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings and metric numbers. Use Inter for long text, tables, and inputs. Ensure high contrast for all text.

usage_rules: NEVER use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds. Use #09090b.
Use Primary color (#6366f1) sparingly for main CTAs and active states.
Use Muted Foreground (#a1a1aa) for secondary text and labels.
Borders should be subtle (#27272a) to define structure without clutter.

Card.usage: Use for all dashboard widgets, forms, and content blocks.

Button.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-md rounded-md font-medium px-4 py-2
Button.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md font-medium px-4 py-2
Button.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground rounded-md px-4 py-2

Input.style: bg-background border border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:border-transparent rounded-md h-10 px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground
Input.usage: Use for all form fields. Ensure labels are visible.

Sidebar.style: bg-card border-r border-border h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 overflow-y-auto hidden md:block
Sidebar.item: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients for backgrounds to add depth.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px or 2px.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

login_bg.alt: Abstract digital network connection dark blue
login_bg.usage: Background for Login/Register pages. Use with overlay.

connect_bg.usage: Background for 'Connect' or 'AI Agent' configuration sections.

Login.layout: Split screen: Left side image (login_bg), Right side form.

Dashboard.layout: Sidebar + Main Content Area. Bento Grid for widgets.

Connections.layout: Grid of Cards for each integration.

Knowledge_Base.layout: List of uploaded files + Upload Area.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Dark Mode' by default using the 'dark' class on the html/body tag.
Use the provided color palette in tailwind.config.js.
Ensure all text is legible against the dark background.
Use 'recharts' for the charts in the dashboard.
Mock the backend data for now, but structure the components to receive data via props.
Ensure the sidebar is responsive (collapsible on mobile).
Follow the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard.
Use the 'Glassmorphism' style for cards where appropriate.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
